# eftoolkit.config

Configuration utilities for JSON loading and logging setup.

## Functions

### load_json_config

::: eftoolkit.config.utils.load_json_config
    options:
      show_root_heading: true
      show_source: true

### setup_logging

::: eftoolkit.config.utils.setup_logging
    options:
      show_root_heading: true
